thread.title: 13 Trudeau And Trump Memes & Tweets That Hilariously Describe Their Awkward Meeting
thread.title_full: 13 Trudeau And Trump Memes & Tweets That Hilariously Describe Their Awkward Meeting

author: Natasha Guzm N
title: 13 Trudeau And Trump Memes & Tweets That Hilariously Describe Their Awkward Meeting
text:
13 Trudeau And Trump Memes & Tweets That Hilariously Describe Their Awkward Meeting Source: Pool/Getty Images News/Getty Images By Natasha Guzm√°n 3 hours ago 
On Monday, Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau and U.S. President Donald Trump met for the first time. The two leaders are diametrically opposed on basically anything having to do with politics: Trudeau proudly welcomes refugees to Canada, while Trump signs executive orders barring them from entering the United States; Trudeau is pro-choice, while Trump wants to defund Planned Parenthood and overturn Roe v. Wade ; Trudeau believes in climate change and supports measures to combat it, while Trump believes it's a hoax. Unsurprisingly, a lot of memes and jokes surrounding Trump and Trudeau's meeting immediately began circulating on social media. 
A picture taken by a Reuters photographer showing dubious Trudeau looking at Trump's outstretched hand became the inspiration for most of the quips around the meeting. Others compared the happier images of Trudeau's meeting with Barack Obama to his more dreary-looking moments alongside the new POTUS. Some couldn't help but note the differences between the bilingual Trudeau and confused-looking, monolingual Trump during both of their statements to the press. Photos of an admiration-filled Ivanka Trump looking at the Canadian leader became the subject of inspirational love tweets. 
Overall, the meeting between the two men brought on a vast array of funny comments on social media. For example ... 1. Can You Blame Her? Relationship goals: find a woman who looks at you the way Ivanka Trump looks at Justin Trudeau. pic.twitter.com/HphcU7svmw
